pbi.title: Migration des artefacts Markdown vers XML

metadata.author: Human_Developer

user_story.action: I want to migrate all project artefacts from Markdown to XML format
user_story.benefit: so that I can leverage automated validation, better integration with Aklo tools, and improved consistency across all projects

technical_specifications.description:
This migration addresses the limitations of Markdown format for project artefacts: - Lack of formal schema validation - Manual validation prone to errors - Difficulty in automated processing and reporting - Inconsistent structure across projects
The migration will use the existing Aklo protocols as the foundation for XML schemas, ensuring consistency with the established Charte IA standards.

risks.risk: Learning curve for users accustomed to Markdown

architecture_documents.description: Architecture documents will define the XML schemas and conversion strategies for each artefact type.
